duties_responsibilities.duty: Program Oversight, RAID Tracking, and Implementation Tracking.
Dependency Management and weekly project status reporting.
Executive updates to Sr Director for Digital Delivery.
Collaborating with multiple teams to drive successful outcomes.
Coordinating with application managers to document development roadmaps.
Collaborating with business implementation leads to layer in the operating model changes and deployment plan.
Tracking, escalating, and driving accountability for the implementation of Client Security efforts.
Managing all phases of a project and overseeing project documentation.
Setting up the structure of the project and performing detailed planning.
Managing project execution, completion of moderate or large projects, defining phase deliverables, tracking milestones and resources, evaluating risks, and recommending contingency plans.
Ensuring quality assurance engagement, resolution of issues, status reviews, development of standards, change control, and compliance with all policies and procedures.
Managing transition and handover to Support Teams.
Developing project plans, overseeing budgets, and determining best methods to meet project objectives.
Reporting changes in project timelines, resources, or budget, and reporting risks and issues during the life of projects.
Auditing documentations of peers and providing coaching to Jr. Project or Project Coordinators.
Strategic development, implementation, and administration of IT programs within functional areas.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Project Management, Business Administration, or a related field (Master's preferred)
